us.derfers.tribex.rapids

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.derfers.tribex.rapids.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static functions for displaying an error dialog or printing a debug message
    Author:
    Nateowami, TribeX

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Utilities() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void debugMsg(java.lang.Object msg)
      Prints a debug message at debug if the current debug level is 2 or greater.
      static void debugMsg(java.lang.Object msg, int lvl)
      Prints a debug message in the form of [RapidS] DEBUG MESSAGE - DATE/TIME DEBUG LEVEL only if lvl is less than or equal to the current debug level the program is running at.
      static java.lang.String EscapeScriptTags(java.lang.String content)
      Escapes all script tags in the file 'filePath'.

      • debugMsg

        public static void debugMsg(java.lang.Object msg)
        Prints a debug message at debug if the current debug level is 2 or greater. The format is [RapidS] DEBUG MESSAGE - DATE/TIME DEBUG LEVEL.
        Parameters:
        msg - The debug message to print

      • debugMsg

        public static void debugMsg(java.lang.Object msg,
            int lvl)
        Prints a debug message in the form of [RapidS] DEBUG MESSAGE - DATE/TIME DEBUG LEVEL only if lvl is less than or equal to the current debug level the program is running at.
        Parameters:
        msg - The debug message to print
        lvl - The debug level for this message

      • XMLStringToDocument

        Returns:
        An XML DOM document
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException

        Escapes all script tags in the file 'filePath'.
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the file to escape.
        Returns:
